div.p: Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?

That's a good question. I hope that in ten years I will have finished my studies and have find a good en well-payed job in Belgium or in a different country. It will be good if I can use languages in my futur life.
Maybe I will have marry somoene and have I hope two children.
